parameter.name: remote
parameter.label: Access Remote Repository
parameter.description: Defines whether openHAB should access the remote repository for add-on installation.

parameter.name: includeIncompatible
parameter.label: Include (Potentially) Incompatible Add-ons
parameter.description: Some add-on services may provide add-ons where compatibility with the currently running system is not expected. Enabling this option will include these entries in the list of available add-ons.
